entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as leaving a mission for Harry. He is described as someone who would have told Remus about the mission if he could.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as receiving a mission from Dumbledore and is planning to go on it with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being part of Harry's mission.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being part of Harry's mission.

entities.name: remus lupin
entities.description: Remus Lupin is mentioned as someone who knows about the mission and is offering to provide protection for Harry.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned in relation to Remus Lupin's marriage.

relationships.description: Dumbledore left a mission for Harry, as mentioned by the text.
Remus Lupin is married to Tonks, as mentioned in the conversation between Hermione and Remus.
Harry is planning to go on a mission with Ron, as mentioned by Harry.
Harry is planning to go on a mission with Hermione, as mentioned by Harry.
